ink.miner.task_agnostic_mining.agnostic_fit¶

ink.miner.task_agnostic_mining.agnostic_fit(miner, X_trans)¶

Function to mine task-agnostic rules :param miner: instance of the RuleSetMiner :param X_trans: Tuple value containing 1) a sparse binary representation, 2) list of indices, 3) column features. :type X_trans: tuple :return: Rules
